net.sf.mmm.service.base.rpc.client

Class AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.service.base.client.AbstractRemoteInvocationCaller<RemoteInvocationServiceQueue,GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCall,GenericRemoteInvocationRpcTransactionalCalls,GenericRemoteInvocationRpcRequest>
          • net.sf.mmm.service.base.rpc.client.AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadDefaultFailureCallback, AttributeWriteDefaultFailureCallback, AttributeWriteTransactionMode, RemoteInvocationCaller<RemoteInvocationServiceQueue>, AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCaller, RemoteInvocationServiceCaller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCallerWithClientMap, RemoteInvocationServiceCallerImplSpring

    public abstract class AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCaller
extends AbstractRemoteInvocationCaller<RemoteInvocationServiceQueue,GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCall,GenericRemoteInvocationRpcTransactionalCalls,GenericRemoteInvocationRpcRequest>
implements RemoteInvocationServiceCaller
    This is the abstract base-implementation of RemoteInvocationServiceCaller.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • getServiceClient

        public <SERVICE extends RemoteInvocationService,RESULT> SERVICE getServiceClient(Class<SERVICE> serviceInterface,
                                                                                 Class<RESULT> returnType,
                                                                                 Consumer<? extends RESULT> successCallback)
        Same as AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCaller.getServiceClient(Class, Class, Consumer, Consumer) but using the default failure callback.
        Specified by:
        getServiceClient in interface AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCaller
        Type Parameters:
        SERVICE - is the generic type of serviceInterface.
        RESULT - is the generic type of returnType.
        Parameters:
        serviceInterface - is the interface of the RemoteInvocationService.
        returnType - is the return type of the Method to invoke.
        successCallback - is the Consumer that is asynchronously invoked on success with when the result of the invoked service Method has been received. The generic type may extend result if it is generic itself. E.g. your service might return List<String> but you can only supply List.class as return type.
        Returns:
        the client-stub of the RemoteInvocationService.

      • getServiceClient

        public <SERVICE extends RemoteInvocationService,RESULT> SERVICE getServiceClient(Class<SERVICE> serviceInterface,
                                                                                 Class<RESULT> returnType,
                                                                                 Consumer<? extends RESULT> successCallback,
                                                                                 Consumer<Throwable> failureCallback)
        This method gets a client-stub for calling exactly one single method on a RemoteInvocationService. After this method has been called, the intended method (with the given returnType) has to be invoked on the resulting client-stub exactly once. This records the desired method invocation and returns a dummy result (typically null) that shall be ignored.
        ATTENTION:
        This is a convenience method for simplicity. It will create an implicit queue that gets committed automatically after a service method has been called on the returned client-stub.
        Specified by:
        getServiceClient in interface AbstractRemoteInvocationServiceCaller
        Specified by:
        getServiceClient in interface RemoteInvocationServiceCaller
        Type Parameters:
        SERVICE - is the generic type of serviceInterface.
        RESULT - is the generic type of returnType.
        Parameters:
        serviceInterface - is the interface of the RemoteInvocationService.
        returnType - is the return type of the Method to invoke.
        successCallback - is the Consumer that is asynchronously invoked on success with when the result of the invoked service Method has been received. The generic type may extend result if it is generic itself. E.g. your service might return List<String> but you can only supply List.class as return type.
        failureCallback - is the Consumer that is asynchronously invoked on failure with the Throwable that occurred when calling the invoked service Method.
        Returns:
        the client-stub of the RemoteInvocationService.

      • getServiceClient

        protected abstract <SERVICE extends RemoteInvocationService> SERVICE getServiceClient(Class<SERVICE> serviceInterface)
        Type Parameters:
        SERVICE - is the generic type of serviceInterface.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
